name: Ultimate Taupe Battle
description:
Hey, do you want to hear incredible news ?

It's my new game : A local Battle game! An Ultimate local Battle game! The Ultimate Battle game! THE ULTIMATE TAUPE BATTLE! Yeah for real guys with a max of testosterone ! (and anyone else with curiosity)

And you embody the taupe ! 

Yhea, it's you, not bad, huh ? 

It's simple, you go underground you dig until you'r opponent... And BOOOM : "you cut her the grass under the foot" !

But be careful if he puts his shield in time he keeps his grass!

You have enough information for now, it's time to play !

Don’t hesitate to send me feedback, any advice is good!

 ( 2 Player local only for the time being)
